FestivalPlanner.Agenda

Class PodiumManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • FestivalPlanner.Agenda.PodiumManager

  • public class PodiumManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all podiums used by Agenda.

    Contains a HashMap with a String containing the name of the stage, and an instance of the object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> observablePodiumList 
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Podium> podiums

    • Constructor Detail

      • PodiumManager

        public PodiumManager()
        Empty constructor for the PodiumManager.

        This empty constructor initialises the this.podiums HashMap.

    • Method Detail

      • containsPodium

        public boolean containsPodium(java.lang.String podiumName)
        Returns true if the podiums HashMap contains the parameter's value. If it does not contain that value it'll return false.
        Parameters:
        podiumName - a string representing a possible key for the podiums HashMap
        Returns:
        a boolean, which is true of the HashMap contains a key the parameter's value

      • addPodium

        public void addPodium(Podium podium)
        Adds the Podium object to the podiums ArrayList if the list doesn't contain the value already.
        Parameters:
        podium - instance of Podium used to check whether the HashMap already contains it or not.

      • removePodium

        public void removePodium(java.lang.String podiumName)
        Removes the Podium object from the podiums ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        podiumName - String representing the key of the object that should be removed from the HashMap

      • editPodium

        public void editPodium(java.lang.String originalName,
                       Podium editedPodium)
        changes a Podium within PodiumManager to have the same values as the given Podium.
        Parameters:
        originalName - the name of the Podium you want to edit
        editedPodium - the new version of the Podium

      • getPodium

        @Nullable
public Podium getPodium(java.lang.String name)
        Searches for a Podium with the given name, returns null if the Podium was not found.
        Parameters:
        name - String representing the name of the podium that is being requested.
        Returns:
        Podium with the given name, returns null if the Podium was not found

      • getPodiumAtLocation

        @Nullable
public Podium getPodiumAtLocation(java.lang.String location)
        Returns the Podium with the given location as location.
        Parameters:
        location - the location the Podium should be at
        Returns:
        Podium with correct location

      • getAllPodiumNames

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllPodiumNames()
        Returns a Set with all the names of the known podiums.
        Returns:
        Set containing all the names of the known podiums

      • getObservablePodiumList

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getObservablePodiumList()
        Getter with an ObservableList that automatically updates when new Podiums are made.
        Returns:
        an ObservableList that automatically updates when new Podiums are made.
